00036 template<typename T> class device_allocator;
00037 
00044 template<>
00045   class device_allocator<void>
00046 {
00047   public:
00049     typedef void                              value_type;
00050 
00052     typedef device_ptr<void>                  pointer;
00053 
00055     typedef device_ptr<const void>            const_pointer;
00056 
00058     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00059 
00061     typedef pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00062 
00068     template<typename U>
00069       struct rebind
00070     {
00073       typedef device_allocator<U> other;
00074     }; // end rebind
00075 }; // end device_allocator<void>

00084 template<typename T>
00085   class device_allocator
00086     : public device_new_allocator<T>
00087 {
00088   public:
00094     template<typename U>
00095       struct rebind
00096     {
00099       typedef device_allocator<U> other;
00100     }; // end rebind
